- Summary: The ordinance aims to amend the existing Riverfront Overlay RIV-2 Algiers Sub-District Standards to allow only the minimum height bonus necessary to achieve a view of the river from the upper story of a three-floor development. The recommendation of the City Planning Commission is "Modified Approval".

- Topic: Amendment to Police Body-Worn and In-Car Camera Footage Access
- Summary: The ordinance aims to mandate that NOPD provide prompt access to body-worn and in-car camera footage to arrestees or their legal counsel. It also prohibits NOPD leadership from authorizing deviation from any NOPD policy and entering into agreements exempting law enforcement officers from NOPD policy. An amendment was proposed to create an exception for footage that could compromise an investigation or endanger witnesses, pending court authorization, and to remove the provision prohibiting NOPD from entering into agreements regarding exceptions to NOPD policy.
- Ordinance Number: 33018
- Votes Summary:
  - Vote 1: Deferred to the meeting of 4/8/21
- Decision/Key Actions: Deferred to the next meeting for further discussion and potential voting
